languages.text: "Я не доверяю им, как и никому, впрочем. Леди Толиман обладает слишком большой властью: большой соблазн самой начать решать, какую информацию сообщать экипажу от вашего имени, а какую — утаивать. Равор тесно сплетен с системами корабля, что открывает широкие возможности для саботажа... За ним надо следить. Что касается Данрока... Человек подобных размера и привычек, уж простите, просто не может не воровать!"

"I do not trust them, but I do not trust anyone. Mistress Toliman has too much power, and will surely be tempted to start deciding for herself what information to share with the crew on your behalf and what to withhold. Ravor is closely intertwined with the ship's systems, which opens up plenty of opportunities for sabotage... He must be watched. As for Danrok... Forgive me, but a man of his size and habits cannot help but steal!"
languages.original_text: "Я не доверяю им, как и никому, впрочем. Forgive me, but a man of his size and habits cannot help but steal!"

languages.text: « Je ne leur fais pas confiance, mais cela étant dit, je ne fais confiance à personne. Maîtresse Toliman a bien trop de pouvoir, et nul doute qu'elle sera bientôt tentée de décider seule quelles informations partager avec l'équipage, et quels renseignements lui cacher. Ravor est étroitement lié aux systèmes du vaisseau, ce qui lui offre toutes sortes de possibilités pour le saboter... Il doit être surveillé de près. Quant à Danrok... Pardonnez-moi, mais un homme de son acabit ne peut se retenir de voler tout ce qui lui tombe sous la main ! »
languages.original_text: "I do not trust them, but I do not trust anyone. Mistress Toliman has too much power, and will surely be tempted to start deciding for herself what information to share with the crew on your behalf and what to withhold. Ravor is closely intertwined with the ship's systems, which opens up plenty of opportunities for sabotage... He must be watched. As for Danrok... Forgive me, but a man of his size and habits cannot help but steal!"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne leur fais pas confiance, mais cela étant dit, je ne fais confiance à personne. Maîtresse Toliman a bien trop de pouvoir, et nul doute qu'elle sera bientôt tentée de décider seule quelles informations partager avec l'équipage, et quels renseignements lui cacher. Ravor est étroitement lié aux systèmes du vaisseau, ce qui lui offre toutes sortes de possibilités pour le saboter... Il doit être surveillé de près. Quant à Danrok... Pardonnez-moi, mais un homme de son acabit ne peut se retenir de voler tout ce qui lui tombe sous la main ! »

languages.text: «No confío en ellos, pero yo no confío en nadie. La señora Toliman tiene demasiado poder y sentirá la tentación de decidir por su propia cuenta qué información compartir con la tripulación de tu parte y qué información reservarse. Ravor está ligado a los sistemas de la nave, lo que le proporciona multitud de oportunidades de sabotaje... Debo mantenerlo vigilado. En cuanto a Danrok... mis disculpas, pero ¡un hombre de su tamaño y costumbres no puede evitar robar!».
languages.original_text: "I do not trust them, but I do not trust anyone. Mistress Toliman has too much power, and will surely be tempted to start deciding for herself what information to share with the crew on your behalf and what to withhold. Ravor is closely intertwined with the ship's systems, which opens up plenty of opportunities for sabotage... He must be watched. As for Danrok... Forgive me, but a man of his size and habits cannot help but steal!"

traits.locale_text: «No confío en ellos, pero yo no confío en nadie. La señora Toliman tiene demasiado poder y sentirá la tentación de decidir por su propia cuenta qué información compartir con la tripulación de tu parte y qué información reservarse. Ravor está ligado a los sistemas de la nave, lo que le proporciona multitud de oportunidades de sabotaje... Debo mantenerlo vigilado. En cuanto a Danrok... mis disculpas, pero ¡un hombre de su tamaño y costumbres no puede evitar robar!».

languages.text: “我不相信他们，但话说回来，我也不相信任何人。托里曼女士权力太大了，她肯定会不由自主地以您的名义向船员透露某些信息，或是隐瞒某些信息。雷沃与整艘船的系统紧密相连，这为内部破坏提供了很多机会……必须有人监视他。至于丹罗克……虽然我不想这么说，但像他这种胖子，又身居这样的要职，是不可能不偷东西的！”
languages.original_text: "I do not trust them, but I do not trust anyone. Mistress Toliman has too much power, and will surely be tempted to start deciding for herself what information to share with the crew on your behalf and what to withhold. Ravor is closely intertwined with the ship's systems, which opens up plenty of opportunities for sabotage... He must be watched. As for Danrok... Forgive me, but a man of his size and habits cannot help but steal!"

traits.locale_text: “我不相信他们，但话说回来，我也不相信任何人。托里曼女士权力太大了，她肯定会不由自主地以您的名义向船员透露某些信息，或是隐瞒某些信息。雷沃与整艘船的系统紧密相连，这为内部破坏提供了很多机会……必须有人监视他。至于丹罗克……虽然我不想这么说，但像他这种胖子，又身居这样的要职，是不可能不偷东西的！”

languages.text: 「私は連中を信用していない。いや、誰も信用できないのだ。トリマン嬢は権力を持ちすぎているから、クルーにどんな情報を共有するか、または共有しないか、情自分で決め始めたくなるに違いない。ラヴォールは船の組織と密接な関係を持っていて、妨害工作の機会がたくさんある…。彼には監視をつける必要がある。ダンロックは…悪いけど、あのような体格と経験を持っている男は、盗むしか能がないのだろう！」
languages.original_text: "I do not trust them, but I do not trust anyone. Mistress Toliman has too much power, and will surely be tempted to start deciding for herself what information to share with the crew on your behalf and what to withhold. Ravor is closely intertwined with the ship's systems, which opens up plenty of opportunities for sabotage... He must be watched. As for Danrok... Forgive me, but a man of his size and habits cannot help but steal!"

traits.locale_text: 「私は連中を信用していない。いや、誰も信用できないのだ。トリマン嬢は権力を持ちすぎているから、クルーにどんな情報を共有するか、または共有しないか、情自分で決め始めたくなるに違いない。ラヴォールは船の組織と密接な関係を持っていて、妨害工作の機会がたくさんある…。彼には監視をつける必要がある。ダンロックは…悪いけど、あのような体格と経験を持っている男は、盗むしか能がないのだろう！」

languages.text: "Ich vertraue ihnen nicht, doch ich vertraue niemandem. Herrin Toliman hat zu viel Macht und wird gewiss versucht sein, in Zukunft selbst zu entscheiden, welche Informationen sie in Eurem Namen mit der Crew teilt und welche sie zurückbehält. Ravor ist eng mit den Systemen des Schiffs verwoben, was reichlich Gelegenheiten zur Sabotage bietet ... Man muss ihn im Auge behalten. Und was Danrok angeht ... Vergebt mir, doch ein Mann von seiner Größe und seinen Gewohnheiten kann schlicht nicht anders, als zu stehlen!"
languages.original_text: "I do not trust them, but I do not trust anyone. Mistress Toliman has too much power, and will surely be tempted to start deciding for herself what information to share with the crew on your behalf and what to withhold. Ravor is closely intertwined with the ship's systems, which opens up plenty of opportunities for sabotage... He must be watched. As for Danrok... Forgive me, but a man of his size and habits cannot help but steal!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich vertraue ihnen nicht, doch ich vertraue niemandem. Ravor ist eng mit den Systemen des Schiffs verwoben, was reichlich Gelegenheiten zur Sabotage bietet ... Man muss ihn im Auge behalten. Und was Danrok angeht ... Vergebt mir, doch ein Mann von seiner Größe und seinen Gewohnheiten kann schlicht nicht anders, als zu stehlen!"

languages.text: "Onlara güvenmiyorum ama ben zaten kimseye güvenmem. Üstat Toliman'ın elinde çok fazla güç var ve sizin adınıza hangi bilgilerin tayfalarla paylaşılacağına ve hangilerinin gizleneceğine kendi başına karar vermek isteyeceğinden eminim. Ravor, geminin sistemleriyle son derece içli dışlı. Bu da bir sabotaj için bol miktarda fırsat sunuyor. Gözlem altında tutulmalı. Danrok ise... Beni affedin ama onun kadar büyük ve onunki gibi alışkanlıklara sahip birisi hırsızlık yapmadan duramaz!"
languages.original_text: "I do not trust them, but I do not trust anyone. Mistress Toliman has too much power, and will surely be tempted to start deciding for herself what information to share with the crew on your behalf and what to withhold. Ravor is closely intertwined with the ship's systems, which opens up plenty of opportunities for sabotage... He must be watched. As for Danrok... Forgive me, but a man of his size and habits cannot help but steal!"
